name: 旧手表 - Old Watch
description: This is an Visual Novel game. It's a story about time leap.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Inter Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT6404 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 Processor: Inter Core I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 Storage: 5 GB available space
